pr_title: Using Readers still causes backlog quota to be observed

timeline.bodyText: nit: the section below should get indented.
timeline.author: merlimat

timeline.bodyText:
It's becoming a bit confusing now to understand the meaning of hasCursors() and isEmpty(). We should be use a more unambiguous/explicit naming here.
My suggestion:

hasCursors() --> isEmtpy() // Since we're talking about a cursors container
isEmpty() --> hasDurableCursors()

(and fix the reversal of the boolean logic)
timeline.author: merlimat

timeline.bodyText: Wouldn't the logic be the reverse here? We're checking isEmpty but the method should return true if it's not empty, no?
timeline.author: merlimat

replies.bodyText: Ya just used the same logic as "isEmpty" but the name of the method hints at a different semantic meaning.
replies.author: jerrypeng
